name: Bracelet of Arul Saba

items.alias: Bracelet Circuitry
Unbalanced Bracelet Blueprints
Balance Adjuster - Left
Balance Adjuster - Right
Personal Furnace
Small Silver Ingot
Uncut Arbiter Gem of the Eternal Juggernaut
Liquid Silver
Bracelet of Arul Saba (Eternal Juggernaut - 5/5 - Left)
Monarch Gem of the Eternal Juggernaut
Monarch Gem of the Infinite Moebius
Monarch Gem of the Bruised Brawler
Monarch Gem of Burning Plasma
Monarch Gem of the Searing Desert
Monarch Gem of the Frozen Tundra
Monarch Gem of the Jagged Landscape
Monarch Gem of the Rainbow-hued Sky
Monarch Gem of Corroded Glory
Monarch Gem of the Silent Killer
Monarch Gem of the Frail Juggernaut
Monarch Gem of the Broken Moebius
Monarch Gem of the Novice Brawler
Monarch Gem of Fiery Plasma
Monarch Gem of the Empty Desert
Monarch Gem of the Icy Tundra
Monarch Gem of the Craggy Landscape
Monarch Gem of the Scarlet Sky
Monarch Gem of Decayed Glory

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** NOTE: NB is the number of gems you want on your bracelet *** #L "Bracelet Circuitry" "150927" x NB #L "Unbalanced Bracelet Blueprints" "150868" ( QL depending on NB ) #L "Balance Adjuster - Left" "150910" or #L "Balance Adjuster - Right" "150911" #L "Personal Furnace" "150930" #L "Small Silver Ingot" "150912" Special Gem x NB ( ie : #L "Arbiter Gem of the Eternal Juggernaut" "165390" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Repeat NB time: Bracelet Circuitry + Unbalanced Bracelet Blueprints = #L "Unfinished Bracelet of Arul Saba" "150817" Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Then: Personal Furnace + Small Silver Ingot = #L "Liquid Silver" "150915" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Liquid Silver + Unfinished Bracelet of Arul Saba = #L "Bracelet of Arul Saba" "150850" Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ And to finish, Repeat NB times: special Gem + Bracelet of Arul Saba = #L "Bracelet of Arul Saba" "165409" Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ There are five different types of special gems. you cannot fit the Bracelet of Arul Saba with two gems of the same kind. moreover you have to fit it in a special order : 1 - Arbiter Gem 2 - Monarch Gem 3 - Emperor Gem 4 - Stellar Jewel 5 - Galactic Jewel Each of these gems have 20 different variations, all giving different buffs. For example, here is the list of all the variations of the Monarch Gem and what they buff: #L "Monarch Gem of the Eternal Juggernaut" "165386" - Max Health #L "Monarch Gem of the Infinite Moebius" "168429" - Max Health, Nano Resist, Max Nano #L "Monarch Gem of the Bruised Brawler" "168470" - Max Health, Add Melee Damage #L "Monarch Gem of Burning Plasma" "168510" - Max Health, Add Energy Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Searing Desert" "168550" - Max Health, Add Fire Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Frozen Tundra" "168617" - Max Health, Add Cold Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Jagged Landscape" "168714" - Max Health, Add Projectile Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Rainbow-hued Sky" "168754" - Max Health, Add Radiation Damage #L "Monarch Gem of Corroded Glory" "168794" - Max Health, Add Chemical Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Silent Killer" "168840" - Max Health, Add Poison Damage These give the same buff but at Half value: #L "Monarch Gem of the Frail Juggernaut" "229981" - Max Health, #L "Monarch Gem of the Broken Moebius" "230042" - Max Health, Nano Resist, Max Nano #L "Monarch Gem of the Novice Brawler" "230048" - Max Health, Add Melee Damage #L "Monarch Gem of Fiery Plasma" "230089" - Max Health, Add Energy Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Empty Desert" "230133" - Max Health, Add Fire Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Icy Tundra" "230173" - Max Health, Add Cold Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Craggy Landscape" "230213" - Max Health, Add Projectile Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Scarlet Sky" "230253" - Max Health, Add Radiation Damage #L "Monarch Gem of Decayed Glory" "230293" - Max Health, Add Chemical Damage #L "Monarch Gem of the Insidious Killer" "230333" - Max Health, Add Poison Damage
